product_name: ExOfficio Kukura Trek'r Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you need shorts that are as active as you are, put on the ExOfficio Trek'r Shorts. With 4-way stretch fabric for comfort and mobility, they are always ready for a long hike or month of travel. Nylon is blended with elastane for comfortable 4-way stretch; hidden stretch waistband won't constrict or bunch. Fabric is treated with a durable water repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. 1 rear zippered pocket, 1 rear rip-and-stick pocket, 2 zippered thigh pockets and 2 front hand pockets provide ample storage. Closeout.
short_description: When you need shorts that are as active as you are, put on the ExOfficio Trek'r Shorts. With 4-way stretch fabric for comfort and mobility, they are always ready for a long hike or month of travel.
